Name: SCALEPLANET
About the game: An interesting arcade game about a lonely astronaut. Explore the planet with Joe. Control the jetpack using the keys. Careful gravity! On the way there will be traps in the form of saws, asteroids, and all sorts of fragments of an old civilization. - Beautiful graphics - Interesting gameplay - Good and atmospheric music - A variety of levels - Arcade - Space
